body: Hello,come just looking for some decent soup pvp servers where people actually play.

title: Amy good soup pvp,servers?

replies.body: Badlion used to be a good one, but I don't think this is the best place to ask as you are pretty much advertising another server when giving it ;-;
replies.body_tagged: Badlion used to be a good one, but I don't think this is the best place to ask as you are pretty much advertising another server when giving it ;-;

replies.body: I have two good ones I usually play on, lots of soup servers have started to die down unfortunately :-(

replies.body:
Advertising other servers is not allowed here on Avicus, and this post is basically asking people to advertise servers. I will be locking this post now.
